name: SupAnimalZ Dash
description:
Welcome to the world of SupAnimalZ Dash!

Run, jump, switch side, change size and collect coins/gems in a thrilling ride through a unique colorful universe.

There’s sprawling stages to conquer, prepare for a near impossible challenge!

This action game offers simple gameplay mechanics that will keep you entertained for hours!

Features:
★ Simple controls
★ Challenging gameplay
★ Unlock/Discover amazing skills and characters through your game progression (35+ unlockable items)
★ Complete dozens of worlds (16+)
★ Various gameplay ingredients through the game progression from dangerous traps to dynamic powerups
★ Full game services integration (Google Play Games): leaderboard, achievements (18+) and cloudsavegame

Available on Google Play here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nexradsoftware.supanimalzdash

Social media:
